text: Collector T.P. Rajesh said on Monday that decision on new addition and deletion in electoral rolls would be taken after due verification of claims of applicants. Presiding over an all party meeting of registered political parties here, he said a total of 11,828 applications had been received in the special camps held on January 31 and February 6 for inclusion and deletion. Of them 7778 applications were for inclusion. The officials designated for election duty would make spot inspection to verify their claims. Annexure list would be released only based on verification. Stating that the Election Commission had made special steps to receive complaints, he said the people could dial at 1950 for passing information. The recognised political parties should attend the all party meetings so as to air their grievances regularly.
title: All party meeting
